categories: Category:Jedi Consulars of the Jedi Order
Category:Jedi Masters of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Kam was a male Human Jedi Master serving the Jedi Order and the Galactic Republic during the Cold War with the resurgent Sith Empire. A Jedi Consular and combat instructor, Kam frequented the Senate Commercial District beneath the Senate Plaza on Coruscant.
